name: Attack of the Living Veggies (and also you're a ninja)
name_original: Attack of the Living Veggies (and also you're a ninja)
description:
Oh no! 

A patch of sentient root vegetables is attacking!

Defend the dojo with your impossibly large collection of swords, and chop up as many carrots and parsnips as you can!

This game was made for the uOttawa Game Dev Club Holiday Jam took just about the whole month allotted, is a buggy mess, and was a lot of fun to work on. 

This was mostly an excuse for me to finally get a ROTT type shooter off the ground, so hopefully I'll be able to use this 'engine' in future projects.

The game doesn't save your score, so paste it in the comments if you really wanna brag.

Happy chopping!
